summary: This bill, HR 4189, directs the Secretary of the Navy to officially recognize specific areas within the National Navy UDT–SEAL Museum in Fort Pierce, Florida. These areas, including the Navy SEAL Museum Memorial, the Memorial Garden and Living Beach, and the Naval Special Warfare K9 Memorial, will be designated as a national memorial, national memorial garden, and national K9 memorial, respectively. The bill aims to honor the service and sacrifice of Navy SEALs.
